CustomField.description: The number of days before today that identifies the cutoff point for Batch Apex Task Removal. (Example: A value of 120 means that completed Tasks that are 120 days old will be deleted on the next Batch Apex Task Removal operation)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of days before today that identifies the cutoff point for Batch Apex Task Removal. (Example: A value of 120 means that completed Tasks that are 120 days old will be deleted on the next Batch Apex Task Removal operation)
CustomField.label: Cutoff Days
